title: Old Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is reviewing Adobe Analytic action tracking in Charles Proxy
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. Navigating to the following call generated: https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net

AND

1. Observing the Contents and Form of this example response: https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net/b/ss/mlbios.at.bat.new.implementation/10/IOSN030200030704/s48338853
custom_expected:
THEN

Proxy will return the following actions:

1. MLB At Bat : iPhone : TV Overlay : bottom.gameday On
- Gameday button on video player
	
1. MLB At Bat : iPhone : Watch : MLB.TV EPG : Watch : Game Click
- Launching game from Watch Now Hero
	
1. MLB At Bat : iPhone : Video Player : Live Click - Tapping Live button on video player

1. MLB At Bat : iPhone : Gameday : Box Score Away Team Click
- Box score team segment tap

1. MLB At Bat : iPhone : Gameday : Box Score Home Team Click
- Box score team segment tap

title: New Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is reviewing Adobe Analytic action tracking in Charles Proxy
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. Navigating to the following call generated: https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net

AND

1. Observing the Contents and Form of this example response: https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net/b/ss/mlbios.at.bat.new.implementation/10/IOSN030200030704/s48338853
custom_expected:
THEN

Proxy will return the following actions:

1. MLB At Bat : iPhone : Watch : Watch Now : Play
FF/RW
- Scrubber (Ending seek)
- Playback Speed
- Languages
- Video Player Pause Button
- Video Player Play BUtton
	
1. MLB At Bat : iPhone : Watch : Watch Now : Pause
- Scrubber (Seeking)
	
1. MLB At Bat : iPhone : Watch : Watch Now : WatchNow Click
- Watch Now Launch
	
1. MLB At Bat : iPhone : Video Player : Rewind Click
- Watch Now Playback Scrubber Backwards
	
1. MLB At Bat : iPhone : Video Player : Fast Forward Click
- Watch Now Playback Scrubber Forwards
	
1. MLB At Bat : iPhone : Watch : Watch Now : Picture in Picture Enter Click
- Video Player PiP Button
	
1. MLB At Bat : iPhone : Watch : Watch Now : Picture in Picture Exit Click
- Video Player PiP Button on mini-player
	
1. MLB At Bat : iPhone : Background App
- Swiping away from video player to background app
